name: Dragon Money
overview: Adventure, battle, dragon extermination!? Select a player character among unique characters and set out to attack on a map! Proceed by throwing the dice and make friends with more than 50 characters to clear the events. Last but not least, raise your character by stopping your rivalry! Even if you have defeated the great enemy dragon... it is the total assets that will decide the final winner! In other words, this is the ultimate fighting type of party board game!
